name: Js-global-analyzer
body:
# Js-global-analyzer
An easy to use and very simple utility lib to help you understand what is going on in the global Namespace of your JavaScript application.

## Installation
Just include the js before any other javascript. 
You can include it later, but you will not know all the stuff that your Javascript application is adding to the global namespace

## API
**GlobalAnalyzer.snapshot();** _Display what happened between the last call of the function_

**GlobalAnalyzer.saveState( 'name' );** _Save the current state of the global namespace, in order to compare it at a later moment_

**GlobalAnalyzer.compareState( 'name' );** _Compare the current state with a state previously saved_


## Error, bug, feature request ?
Please create tickets, pull request, email me, etc .. Also comments are welcome!
tagline: A Javascript module to help you understand what is going on in your global namespace
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
